const vec4[2] palette = vec4[2] (
	vec4(1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0),
	vec4(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
);

const int[27] matrix = int[27] (
	0x8a00160, 0x8b80e70, 0x45eb0394, 0xe06c097,
	0xd802e6b8, 0x2e0f7804, 0x7001100, 0x41d11ac0,
	0xed55a8b0, 0x183c0781, 0xc818047c, 0xa61f0726,
	0x2c0700c, 0xa70948f, 0x42840d8c, 0xf7a140,
	0x284050, 0xec0e739c, 0x3fdd5cea, 0x6ff173a,
	0x775d81ce, 0xc9bdf3e5, 0xef7bff7d, 0xe7f9ffef,
	0xaee3bf9f, 0x7dfafeb5, 0xfd
);

vec4 fontpix(ivec2 px, int letter) {
    if (px.x < 0 || px.y < 0 || px.x >= 3 || px.y >= 5)
        return palette[1];
    
    int pxv = px.y + px.x * 5 + letter * 15;
    
    if (pxv < 0 || pxv >= 15 * LETTERS)
        return palette[1];
    
    int pind = pxv >> 5;
    int bind = pxv & 31;

    return palette[(matrix[pind] >> bind) & 1];
}
